data.comment: The big names in today's match at Craven Cottage have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Cardiff to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Paul Tierney signals a Fulham throw-in in Cardiff's half.
Anthony Knockaert gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
In the minute 3, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paul Tierney awards Cardiff a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cardiff at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 5, Cardiff awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Cardiff in the half of Fulham.
Can Cardiff get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
In the minute 7, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Cardiff have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Goal! Curtis Nelson heads Cardiff into a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Joe Ralls.
In the minute 9, Neeskens Kebano gets an equalizer for Fulham. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Bobby Reid to set up the goal.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cyrus Christie.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Fulhamâ€™s Cyrus Christie is on his feet again at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Cardiff in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Cardiff.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cardiff's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 16, Cardiff to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cardiff goal kick.
In the minute 18, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Cardiff just outside Fulham's area.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Sean Morrison, who is grimacing with pain.
Sean Morrison is back on the pitch.
In the minute 23, Free kick Cardiff.
Cardiff drives forward and Sean Morrison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Cardiff.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Cardiff in the half of Fulham.
Fulham push forward at Craven Cottage and Anthony Knockaert gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cardiff defence.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 27, Tom Cairney (Fulham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In London, Joshua Onomah of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Cardiff at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Cardiff in the half of Fulham.
Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Cyrus Christie (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, Cardiff have a goal kick.
Cardiff awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cardiff awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Fulham.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Fulham's Anthony Knockaert gets in a shot on goal at Craven Cottage. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Sean Morrison (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Cardiff is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Paul Tierney signals a Fulham throw-in in Cardiff's half.
Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 38, Cardiff's Danny Ward misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Free kick Cardiff.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Cardiff capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Fulham pushes forward through Harrison Reed, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cardiff to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
Throw-in for Cardiff at Craven Cottage.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Josh Murphy for Cardiff is whistled offside.
Goal kick for Cardiff at Craven Cottage.
Cardiff will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fulham.
Cyrus Christie of Fulham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fulham's Anthony Knockaert gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cardiff defender.
In the minute 45, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Leandro Bacuna for Cardiff has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Paul Tierney awards Fulham a goal kick.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Craven Cottage with Nathaniel Mendez Laing replacing Junior Hoilett.
Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a first substitution, with Lee Tomlin replacing Marlon Pack.
In the minute 46, Aboubakar Kamara is replacing Neeskens Kebano for the home team.
Paul Tierney signals a Cardiff throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 47, Nathaniel Mendez Laing (Cardiff) strikes at Craven Cottage but his header is cleared.
Goal! Lee Tomlin gives Cardiff a 1-2 lead.
Throw-in for Cardiff in their own half.
In the minute 48, Cardiff needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Cyrus Christie of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Cardiff have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, In London Fulham drive forward through Harrison Reed. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Cardiff awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Craven Cottage, Bobby Reid has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Fulham.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
In London Fulham attack through Anthony Knockaert. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 52, Will Vaulks (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Josh Murphy of Cardiff smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Cardiff in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Important block from the Fulham defence as Lee Tomlin fires in a strike for Cardiff.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Cardiff are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In the minute 59, Fulham's Marek Rodak has been booked in London.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 61, Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cardiff's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Joe Ralls is booked for the away team.
Fulham are coming forward and Tom Cairney gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, Cardiff have a goal kick.
Cardiff awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paul Tierney blows against Cardiff's Lee Tomlin for offside.
In the minute 65, Paul Tierney awards Cardiff a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fulham drives forward and Aboubakar Kamara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Aboubakar Kamara hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Fulham!
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Cyrus Christie (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
Robert Glatzel is on a sub for Danny Ward for Cardiff.
Nathaniel Mendez Laing for Cardiff drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Cardiff pushes forward through Will Vaulks, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cardiff have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Cardiff's Curtis Nelson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Fulham's Cyrus Christie is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Fulham.
Fulham are pushing forward but Michael Hector's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cardiff goal kick.
The home team have replaced Anthony Knockaert with Denis Odoi. This is the second substitution made today by Scott Parker.
In the minute 77, Cardiff to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Cardiff's Nathaniel Mendez Laing misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Paul Tierney awards Fulham a goal kick.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cardiff's half?
Cyrus Christie (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 80, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Cardiff is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Josh Murphy with Callum Paterson.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Lee Tomlin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in Cardiff.
In the minute 84, It seems as if Lee Tomlin is unable to continue. Gavin Whyte replaces him for the away team.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Cardiff.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick for Cardiff in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 89, Fulham have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Cardiff.
Cardiff awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a Cardiff throw-in in Fulham's half.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Cardiff in their own half.
Cardiff are pushing forward but Robert Glatzel's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Ball safe as Cardiff is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 1-2.
Maxime Le Marchand is replacing Joe Bryan for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Joshua Onomah (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
